name: Trapped... in Space!
description:
Controls:
Up: W / up arrow
Down: S / down arrow
Left: A / left arrow
Right: D / right arrow

A short, endless, investigative horror game where you find yourself trapped in an abandoned space station.

Can you unravel the mystery?

An investigation into the nature of the duality of self.

(Made in 4 hours lol!)

Credits:

Development: Darren Kearney

Sound: Helen Lynch

Writing: Joshua Goodwin
